entry.title: https://github.com/TEN-framework/TEN-Agent
entry.content: TEN Agent is a conversational AI powered by the TEN, integrating Gemini 2.0 Live, OpenAI Realtime, RTC, and more. It delivers real-time capabilities to see, hear, and speak, while being fully compatible with popular workflow platforms like Dify and Coze.

entry.title: https://github.com/stanfordnlp/dspy
entry.content: DSPy: The framework for programming—not prompting—language models

entry.title: https://github.com/OpenSPG/KAG
entry.content: KAG is a logical form-guided reasoning and retrieval framework based on OpenSPG engine and LLMs. It is used to build logical reasoning and factual Q&A solutions for professional domain knowledge bases. It can effectively overcome the shortcomings of the traditional RAG vector similarity calculation model.

entry.title: https://github.com/langflow-ai/langflow
entry.content: Langflow is a low-code app builder for RAG and multi-agent AI applications. It’s Python-based and agnostic to any model, API, or database.

entry.title: https://github.com/Byaidu/PDFMathTranslate
entry.content: PDF scientific paper translation with preserved formats - 基于 AI 完整保留排版的 PDF 文档全文双语翻译，支持 Google/DeepL/Ollama/OpenAI 等服务，提供 CLI/GUI/Docker
